author: Staff Reporter
text:
The election control room at the collectorate has so far received 39 complaints from the public. District Election Officer and Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy said that all the complaints were forwarded to the respective officials and action taken.

He said that after the model code of conduct came to force, 7,432 wall paintings, posters and banners were removed at various places across the district. A six-member team is monitoring the news and advertisements every day in television, newspapers and magazines so as to keep track of paid-news and also violation of model of code of conduct, if any.

Officials also seize Rs. 1 lakh unaccounted money from Murugesan of Karur
title: Control room gets 39 complaints
